Fixed.title: Molecules / Menu
Fixed.description: Moved Menu from ðŸŒ³ Organisms to ðŸŒ± Molecules.

Changed.title: Molecules / UserDropdown
Changed.description: Extended the UserDropdown to optionally show a dropdown container onClick.

Added.title: Get started / Changelog
Added.description: Added a Changelog to properly document the changes and highlight breaking changes like this one.

Added.title: Templates / layout / Authland
Added.description: Added a layout template for Authland to easily get started with pages like login or sign up.

Added.title: Templates / layout / Adminland
Added.description: Added a layout template for Adminland to easily get started with pages like create, read, update and delete.

Added.title: Templates / layout / Userland
Added.description: Added a layout template for Userland to easily get started with pages like home, product, blog.

Added.title: Atoms / Switch
Added.description: Added a switch component to toggle boolean values.

Removed.title: Design System Instance
Removed.description: We removed the designSystemInstance because it was the cause of some local storage problems, that forced users to reset browser cache after visiting the story.
